short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recursos de integração impressora, biometria, scanner, impressora termica entre outros hardware para aplicações web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It assists the web user to send documents directly to the printer, use printed forms, scanner, biometrics, camera and other types of hardware that the web does not allow easy access!
